title: #1001 The 1,000 interview celebration
description: On August 4, 2008, I posted a video up on Mixergy where I looked up into the web cam on my computer and I said “I failed.” And I said that I was going to shut down my invitation business and start doing interviews with entrepreneurs and people in general who I admire so I can learn from them and take back what I’ve learned from them to build a more successful company in the future. And I said that along the way you’d get to watch and learn as I learned directly from my heroes. We did it. A thousand interviews later here I am today bringing back some of the most memorable and most influential interviewees. People who helped me both on camera here with you and off. I invited them on to a Google Hangout to talk about the old days, to ask them some new questions and to do short interviews with them all for you. That’s what this is all about. My goal when I started out was to build a successful company. I think Mixergy is that company. But I wanted to be even more successful. My goal is that I started to talk in interviews afterwards evolved into saying that I would like someone who is watching these interviews to learn from them, to use what they’ve learned and then build a successful company so they can come back and do an interview themselves. I am the founder of Mixergy, home of the ambitious upstart. And this is my 1,000th interview. More interviews -> https://mixergy.com/moreint Rate this interview -> https://mixergy.com/rateint
author: Andrew Warner
excerpt: The 1,000th interview! You won't believe who Mixergy got for its 1,000th interview.
text: Interviews Courses Collections Interviews Courses Sponsor About Help Login Go Premium Big thanks to Mixergy's Venture Capitalists (Premium Members) and viewers! - Andrew Warner & team What our VCs (Premium Members) say about Mixergy: Those early days of Mixergy truly shaped my thinking of what entrepreneurship really means and until today, everyday, I strive to succeed without giving up hope and always remaining optimistic. Moses Akizian I was able to gain confidence that I too, can play the role of entrepreneur and strike out on my own adventure. Mitch Roth It's great to hear that some of the other entrepreneurs out there have encountered the same obstacles that I face today.... Reza (from Trading Algo X) Mixergy interview and courses have helped me overcome fears that were keeping me from succeeding in business and life. Howard Hermes Sound extra worldly in start-up knowledge. Nick Murray I was able to be more constructive in setting priorities and working through challenges.. Sadie Forrester With "in the trenches entrepreneur" interviews, Mixergy keeps it real and relavent and boosts my confidence to keep taking action. Martha Huntley Mixergy is a go-to resource for getting new perspectives on any entrepreneurial topic. Rachel Kersten Mixergy has been the backbone and adviser in my entrepreneurial journey. Rich Peterson You changed how I approached my future. 4 Months ago I had NO idea that these sorts of opportunities even existed. Max Latimer Thanks for the inspiration and guidance, and keep up the great work! Dan Keldsen Andrew is one I look out for as a mentor from a far and I'm thankful for making the entrepreneurs hard earned knowledge accessible to the world. Thank you! Lenny Ramirez Take first step in building my first business. Cheers on 4 digits, Andrew! Erik van Mechelen Mixergy is the first thing on my headphones on my way to the office, and often the last thing I hear at night as I drift off to sleep. David Kelly Make more money! Help more customers! Ben Levi Change my mindset from "idea generation" to "action taker." Gezim Your courses are certainly worth every penny and I have learned more about entrepreneurship than in my entire university career. Thank you. David I've nearly doubled my revenue the past year applying snippets of tools and tactics revealed within these interviews and courses. Patrick Hitches I learned a key piece of business strategy that has allowed me to earn tens of thousands of dollars in consulting revenue. Iain Dooley Made long lasting, meaningful connections with people like Rob Walling, Patrick Mckenzie Omar Sayyed Gain knowledge and confidence in business and life. Thank you Andrew Warner and the Mixergy team! Kyle Patrick McCrary I'm really looking forward to the next 1,000 interviews and all the tools, skills, and tactics I'll learn! Keep up the amazing work. Doug Kaufman Left my corporate job and have a successful business Justin Jacques I was able to launch my own interview show and learn from the countless entrepreneurs that have blazed the trail for others to follow and see what was possible! Craig Stokes Your interviews and courses help me think more clearly. I usually listen when I go for a run in the mornings and it's inspirational. Joe Apfelbaum Build a six figure company by setting up one landing page and without building any product or services. Troy Dean With your interviews and courses, I'm able to learn fast with people who made it and who faced the same problems I can face at some points in my business. Harold Paris I was able to apply many of the concepts to my work and as a result I got promoted to Marketing Director at our firm. Thank you Andrew for the wonderful service. Samir Penkar The courses and interviews are rare gems on the internet. Thanks for the hard work!. Tope Mixergy interviews gave me the inspiration and confidence to quit my corporate job and prepare me for my upcoming entrepreneurial path. Nick Sudhaus I think the greatest value I have is the inspiration to understand what it takes to succeed as an entrepreneur. Rob Rawson It is no understatement to say that this one membership to mixergy facilitated the quantum leap in my life from English teacher to COO and is also responsible for my continued upward trajectory. Deon D'Silva Increased my business profit. KCLau I have learned so much and am finally taking steps to start a blog, build my first app, and start living the life I've always wanted. Thanks Andrew! Jason Koprowski The tactics and strategies I've heard on Mixergy have also been eye opening. Michael Faron Better understand the power of copywriting. Dream a little (lot) bigger. It's okay to fail, in fact fail fast and fail a lot on the road to success. Thank you for these golden lessons. Julie Kim McMahon It just empowered me to move forward and strengthened my voice as I became founder of a small tech consulting firm who works with nonprofits. Thanks for all the practical advice! Joed Lopez Broadened my perspective on business by listening to all the different types of entrepreneurs you interview. Michael McEwen I learned how to add the price tag on Pinterest. It's a very helpful interview. CheVon Keep on working on my projects every day until they start working for me. Victor Burgos I was able to find the right back end CRM in Infusionsoft that has helped me automate a huge part of my business and find inspiration from all the other stories of struggle and triumph :-) Patrick Curtis Discovering how other entrepreneurs succeed is inspiring; yet seeing their faces when they’ve failed brings a sense of human connection. Mixergy has given me a resource taught by experts to hopefully reduce my own mistakes. Brian I have been a Mixergy member for a while now, and every time I feel lost or unsure, I turn to a Mixergy interview and it reminds me that I am not the only one and people just like me have been here before. Chris O'Halloran I was able to realize that I have the same issues and problems that every other entrepreneur before me has faced. With some persistence and listening to how to overcome those challenges from your past interviewees I learned that I to can build a profitable, successful company. Travis Johnson Longtime listener, love your work Andrew! Neil Lockwood Start a company, change my life, get over my limiting beliefs! Thanks Andrew. Joshua Millage Selected an equity partner for ZipTechMobile.com and launched the MVS (minimum viable service) this month. Steve Vigus I am able to bring more value to my 9-5. More importantly, I've been able to tackle all my after hours projects with more confidence and enthusiasm. Michael Wills Become an effective entreprenuer at a global, award winning marketing agency serving fortune 500 clients. Mike Roberts Start an ecommerce business selling sports clothing which achieved $160,000 in annual sales using Facebook marketing only. Dane Shelford I am new to your premium membership,but I am learning a lot even creating my first online product. I have a long way to go but very excited. (Mixergy.com rocks in Africa!) Alain (Alby) Mbanjabahizi Launched DomainSherpa.com, which is like Mixergy but for the $5 billion domain name industry. Michael Cyger "Change the world! P.S. I think I was one of the first premium members!" Mark Michuda Overcome fears and hesitations. Lessons, courses - they, YOU, provide give me the courage to know the answers are out there. That's often times the one thing needed to keep moving forward! Thank you Andrew! Clay I've been a member for years and am thankful for all the fantastic interviews. It's great to learn about what really makes money and how to grow a business. Purvi Rajani Better Storytelling, keyword search, sales process, finding customer pain, interview and test developers... but most of all I know I am not alone and that others share my challenges and frustrations. Brendan Robinson I've applied so many of the tactics that I learned on Mixergy to my day job as the online marketing manager of a B2B software start-up. We've had 100% year-over-year growth the last two years, and this year we're looking to do even better than that. Andrew Nadeau Mixergy toughed me so much about business that I can't thank Andrew and his crew enough! Thank you and congratulations on 1,000th interview. Arcadiy Mordecai Focus and grow my business. Build proper membership websites. Keep my head in the game by listening to other entrepreneurs that go through good and bad experiences. Siggy Gudbrandsson Mixergy videos have helped keep me on track this past year, everything from learning how to manage my remote team, pre-launch strategies, even explainer video tips. Thank you so much Andrew for creating the opportunity to dream and the tools to turn dreams into reality. Kevin Michael Gray I don't watch any TV or anything else. Mixergy is not only entertainment for me, but I also pick up great nuggets and tips that I can implement in my business right away. Ben Marvazi We improved our customer support practices thanks to the course by Sarah Hatter and successfully began using outbound phone calls thanks to the course by James Kennedy - and a lot more. John Federico Get inspired! Steve Gershik Stay inspired. Sean Saulsbury Attract amazing contributors to Hackerpreneur Magazine and then use Facebook ads to find loyal subscribers. Thanks for all you do. Marc Eglon Better marketing and system solution ideas, as well as inspiration, for my businesses, Vacord Screen Printing and Anterose Online Dating Profile Reviews. Stuart Brent I am a military officer and fast jet flying instructor in the UK and your interviews helped build my wife's business as a Chiropractor. She now has a clinic with 6 figure profits, employs 8 staff and has also used your teachings to become the VP of the British Chiropractic Association. Tim Davies Started an online business in Nigeria which is growing gradually. Got the courage to quit my job and pursue my entrepreneurial passion.Also about to launch a interview webshow like mixergy to interview entrepreneurs doing business in Africa. Chi If I was forced to give up business tools, Mixergy would be the last one I let go. It's that important and you don't have Mixergy Premium you are missing out on valuable, profitable, enlightening, genius business ideas from millionaire and dec-amilionaires mindsets. Cory Boatright My only complaint is that I didn't hear about mixergy sooner. Thank you Andrew and team! Evan Tardy You can learn at lot of others and you have the platform to share the best information and knowledge with others I love the transcripts and how you interview keep up the good work. John Strange I was able to quit my job with my text expansion software PhraseExpander! Thanks! Andrea Nagar Get the courage and knowledge to go after what I really want by joining a startup and eventually starting my own company. Thank you Andrew!!!! Christophe I was able to free my mind from the mindset of the corporate world and find my true mind that I need to live my life like never before. You were the one who opened my eyes, Andrew. Thank you very much for everything. You are my hero. Neo Bajaafar Mixergy gave me the ideas, tactics, and inspiration to grow my business to a point where I was able to comfortably walk away from my corporate career and become a full time freedom fighter. David Rauch Stay inspired to keep hustling. Babs I was able to hire an offshore developer to complete a project which would have otherwise been "on hold" for months if not a year or more. Thanks for your hard work Andrew, truly inspirational. Chris Stoyles Your interviews and courses has motivated my wife and I to start an app-company here in Denmark + a few niche blogs, that could give us some passive income over time. Love the concept and would love to make a Danish version of Mixergy :) Brian Ebbesen I've been able to grow my brand New Stitch a Day to more than 26,000 email subscribers, 67,000 YouTube subscribers, and a six figure income because of the things I've learned through Mixergy interviews and courses. Johnny Vasquez I was able to grow smarter and wiser off the backs and minds of people smarter, wiser, and more experienced in areas that are not my strengths. Mickie Kennedy I am more ready and confident to take on this next challenge with some very insightful mentors and mastermind friends but Mixergy's enlightenment is a constant light upon the sometimes murky and unknown path. Bruce Brodeen Losing both my incomes within a 2 month period was not cool. But, Mixergy gave me the courage to not fear or and the insight not to fret. Instead Mixergy gave me the knowledge and encouragement to to creative and sale my Art related products and services online. Aladine Vargas Start a business, improve my business, grow my business, become a better entrepreneur! Tim de Jardine Learned how to create a funnel that works for me (and for my clients) Tim de Jardine I was one of the lucky ones in that I got to work with you and help you grow Mixergy in the early days. But you knew that already ;) Thank you from the bottom of my heart, Andrew. Tristan de Montebello I was able to build my content writing business, Writocity.com, bigger than I ever thought possible in such a short period of time. The Mixergy interviews and courses helped me overcome obstacles which propelled myself and my business to new heights. Thanks! Kevin Brown Because of Mixergy, I am able to stay motivated, inventive and work on my own business . It gives me wide perspective on the business world with all the novelties that did not even exist some 10 years ago. I've been listening to Mixergy for about 5 years. I love Mixergy. I want to thank Andrew and the team - Thank you! Katya Thornton See the world differently. Lauren Nham Can't thank you enough for providing this resource to us, I recommend you to every entrepreneur I meet that asks me a question. I just say "have you seen the Mixergy with ....." and if they say "what's Mixergy" I demand they go find out ASAP. Jordan Gal Helped me muster the courage to quit my corporate zombie job. Pat Caffrey Get inspired to build a better business. Manuel Oviedo Mixergy interviews helped me clarify my goal and persisted to action. To getting out there and act in spite of my fears. I'm working with clients in my area of passion. Helping entrepreneurs improve their communication with customers and grow. Thanks Andrew! Todd Keeling I was able to learn from all of the courses but the one thing I gained that is impossible to put a monetary value to is the confidence to helped me find to overcome my fear and just take action. The premimum courses have GREAT actionable guides, but most of all I was able to see real people doing extraordinary things. Myka Bond Strategy & tactics + inspiration! James Ashenhurst I learned how to run a successful business. Thanks Andrew! Philip Petrescu My favorite interview? Sean Ellis. A real education in how to think about removing barriers to customer adoption. Good Stuff. R.E. Vaughn From the first day, I saw Mixergy on the internet 2 years ago. I felt like I found some treasure. Zorge Still learning new things. Ahmad I was finally able to understand how to *practically* take the first step of starting a new business and especially on how to find the first customers. Henrik Bergström I've been able to grow a small consulting business and my first SaaS application, Sprintboards, knowing that I can lean on Mixergy, my mentor, for insight, brainstorming sessions, best practices, and a bunch of laughs along the way. Thanks! Mike Flynn I learned enough from the John Warilow interview (about how to build a sell-able business) that my business is running in large part without me--and I'm confident I can sell it within the next 2 years for 4 or 5 x revenue. Thank YOU Andrew, for all that you do! Jay Webb Become a true freedom fighter! Left my full-time job to pursue my podcast and develop more apps. Love you Andrew! Steve Young Learn new concepts, come up with new ideas, improve my business! Tom Keep the dream alive. Daniel Become a consultant and launch RegsApp SOP software Duncan Malcolm x Where should I email this interview? I hate SPAM and promise to keep your email address safe. --Andrew Warner
